title: What do you mean client update?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I can't believe this just happened, I had league open for at least 20 minutes waiting for my friend to get on. In a lobby for the new dark star game mode, I start it up, get in to a game and before I can even figure out what I'm doing, my game closes and the client pops up with a random update (picture linked).

First game of today I've almost played and I get a client update, there was a patch already downloaded for dark star kha and ori but there was nothing about a client update.
I would love some answers for why this happened while I was in game and why it just updated out of the blue.
Riot please.

~Rexisea

replies.body:
Update: Client finished updating at 26% (about) and it takes me to the legacy client ( http://imgur.com/a/38wx3 ) I can log in and everything. I thought the legacy client was removed? 

Riot please, what just happened..
